title: Obama calls for tech regulation to combat disinformation on social media - CNBC
content:
1. Obama calls for tech regulation to combat disinformation on social media  CNBC
  2. Obama pressures Big Tech on disinformation in Silicon Valley speech  CNN
  3. ‘Democracy will wither’: Barack Obama outlines perils of unregulated big tech in sweeping speech  The Guardian
  4. Obama warns about disinformation at Stanford event.  The Washington Post
  5. Obama points finger at tech companies for disinformation in major speech  The Hill
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Former President Barack Obama said on Thursday that tech "platforms seems to be tilting us in the wrong direction."
